objects.specification: A large rectangular platform with a smooth, flat neutral grey surface and low-profile height, suitable as the main floor of a modern exhibition space with subtle matte finish.
Tall vertical panels in neutral off-white color with a matte finish, forming the back wall of the booth, creating a clean backdrop for displays.

children.specification: A long rectangular banner with vibrant brand logo and promotional graphics, printed on lightweight fabric-like material, featuring bold colors and crisp edges.

objects.specification: Tall neutral off-white wall panel with a central entrance opening, featuring a smooth matte surface consistent with the booth design.

objects.specification: A realistic full-scale car model with sleek aerodynamic lines, featuring a shiny metallic silver body with reflective surfaces, detailed wheel rims, transparent windows, and accurate proportions to showcase the design.
A modern lit display pedestal with clean straight edges, made of glossy neutral material with integrated spot lighting, sized for holding promotional brochures or information tablets.
A sleek reception desk with a smooth bright blue finish, minimalist design, featuring a flat counter surface and subtle branding accents.

children.specification: A comfortable staff chair with a padded seat and backrest, in a matching bright blue finish, slim legs, designed for receptionist use.

objects.specification: A small padded visitor stool with round seat and slim metallic legs, neutral grey finish for momentary seating around the demo car.
